bahikhata.utilities.testingutilities

Class BahiKhataTestToken

  • java.lang.Object
    • bahikhata.utilities.testingutilities.BahiKhataTestToken

  • @Component
 @Profile(value="test")
public class BahiKhataTestToken
extends Object
    Techpert:Bahikhata : 0.0.1 :This class is used as a Token Provider and HttpHeader provider for Integration tests.

    The token can be obtained from getToken() method.It needs to be used in combination with BahiKhataMockUser annotation,as the token is set based on values provided in @BahiKhataMockUser annotation.

    To write an integration test this class needs to be autowired and Each test case needs to be annotated with @BahiKhataMockUser.The headers to be sent in mock mvc request needs to be obtained from getHeaders() and getNoAuthHeaders() methods. This method sets the Authorization header and Content-Type header.ContentType By default is Application/json

    Since:
    28 Jul 2019
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Rudhra Koul
